func GetTLSVersion(tr *http.Transport) string {
    switch tr.TLSClientConfig.MinVersion {
    case tls.VersionTLS10:
        return "TLS 1.0"
    case tls.VersionTLS11:
        return "TLS 1.1"
    case tls.VersionTLS12:
        return "TLS 1.2"
    case tls.VersionTLS13:
        return "TLS 1.3"
    }

    return "Unknown"
}
